caption.p: ( a) Inhibitory activity (mm) of O. vulgare essential oil against pathogens and five phytopathogenic bacteria. (■) oregano; ( ■) kanamycin positive control. ( b) Paper disk diffusion assay of oregano essential oil against Escherichia coli. Disk O: oregano oil; disk +: kanamycin positive control; disk −: ethanol negative control.
